about_the_game:
Level Up Your Love Life with Samantha, the Gaming Goddess!

Experience the Thrill of Geek Chic Romance with Samantha

Embark on a nerdy adventure with Samantha, a witty nerd and gaming enthusiast. This captivating content invites you to explore a world of pixels, pop culture, and endless fun as you connect with this intelligent and passionate character.

About Samantha:

  • Geeky Dates: Experience unforgettable dates filled with gaming marathons, comic-con adventures, and late-night anime binges.

  • Shared Passions: Discover Samantha's love for video games, board games, and all things nerdy, and share your own passions with her.

  • Romantic Moments: Create lasting memories as you build a strong emotional connection with Samantha.

  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in beautifully environments and character designs that bring Samantha's world to life.

Perfect for Fans of:

  • Romantic visual novels

  • Dating simulators

  • Gaming

  • Geek culture

Don't miss your chance to experience the thrill of Samantha's story. Purchase the DLC today and start your own epic love quest!

Samantha is a witty nerd and gaming enthusiast. She’s unbeatable in games and loves sharing her geeky passions.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full nudity, front and back of several all characters

You can set up a scene and simulate sex with a 3D model.

The animations simulate sexual positions, and it is possible to move the camera freely around the scene, having a complete perspective of the sexual act.

There is nothing forced in the game.

All situations and characters were made just to simulate pleasure in a passionate and light way.

It is possible to see in detail the characters facial expressions and erogenous zones, including genitalias. 

You must be legal age of majority or over to play this game.
